titleStmt.title: A map of ye kingdome of Ireland. With perticular notes distinguishing the townes reuolted taken or burnt since the late rebellion.

notesStmt.note: An engraving 11 1/4x 8 in. This map is placed in the Thomason collection .. between books of March 11 and March 15, 1641/2. .. William Webbe of Oxford is known as a publisher from 1628 to 1639. The Irish rebellion is no doubt that which began on Oct. 23, 1641. -- Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
